series.title: Classics Illustrated
series.description: These comic book adaptations of classics should not be combined with the works they are based on.

series.title: Campfire Graphic Novels
series.description: Inspired by the enduring relationship between a campfire and gripping storytelling, Campfire produces four series of titles: 1. "Classics" adapt timeless literature from some of the greatest writers; 2. "Mythology" features epics, myths, and legends from around the world – tales that transport readers to lands of mystery and magic; 3. "Biography" bring to life remarkable and inspiring figures from history; and 4. "Originals" showcases exciting new characters and stories from some of today’s most talented graphic novelists and illustrators.

series.description: Inspired by the enduring relationship between a campfire and gripping storytelling, Campfire produces four series of titles: 1. "Classics" adapt timeless literature from some of the greatest writers; 2. "Mythology" features epics, myths, and legends from around the world – tales that transport readers to lands of mystery and magic; 3. "Biography" bring to life remarkable and inspiring figures from history; and 4. "Originals" showcases exciting new characters and stories from some of today’s most talented graphic novelists and illustrators.
